title.narrative: Agricultural Development: Project to Improve the Resilience of Agricultural Systems in Chad

description.narrative: PARSAToverall objective is to contribute to the sustainable improvement of the food security and incomes of rural households in the project zone. Its development objective is to improve the resilience of the agricultural systems and the economy of rural households to climate change and external shocks.

name.narrative: Agricultural Development: Project to Improve the Resilience of Agricultural Systems in Chad

description.narrative: This point represents the centroid of the project area. For more detailed geographic information, please refer to the project page on the IFAD website.
